name: EveryDayStoic
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Every Day Stoic Flash Briefing gives you a thought-provoking and unique stoic quote to ponder each and every day. 

With unique content from Marcus Aurelius, Epictetus, and Seneca the Younger delivered each day, the Every Day Stoic Flash Briefing skill will help you keep centered mentally and ready to face the challenges of your day!

More resources are available at EveryDayStoic.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
